price: Galaana akkuma banametti dhiisi. isaan waraana bishaaniin dhidhimfamoodha.”
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
